properties.headline: Flood Warning issued January 1 at 10:36AM CST by NWS Memphis TN
properties.description:
The National Weather Service has issued a Flood Warning for the
Tallahatchie River.

The National Weather Service in Memphis TN has issued a

* Flood Warning for
the Tallahatchie River near Swan Lake
* from Saturday, January 4, until further notice.
* At 10 AM Wednesday the stage was...22.8 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Maximum forecast stage of 27.5 feet on Sunday, January 5.
* Flood stage is 26.0 feet.
* Forecast to remain steady through Thursday afternoon, then begin
rising Thursday night. The river is forecast to rise above flood
stage early Saturday.
At 28.0 feet, Flooding is occurring on farm land near the river.
properties.instruction:
A followup Flood Statement will be issued this evening or sooner if
conditions warrant.

For graphical river and flood information...please go to
www.weather.gov and click near Memphis on the map, then select Rivers
and Lakes.

Do not drive through flooded areas...turn around don't drown.

Stay tuned to your weather radio and your local news media for the
latest river information.
